resources.string:
Hi, I am Md. Nayem Molla. I am 22 years old. 

Now, I am a student of Rajshahi University at CSE department. 
My hobby is playing card, chess. About my family I have three brothers. they are very helpful and kind person like me. 
I have another hobby that is catching fish. I remember that one day 
when I was catching fish I noticed that my fishing rod eat a big snack. 
At that moment I was so scared that I didn't talk and that experienced is so horror. 

We are live in a village called Baro Poyla, Saturia, Manikganj. 
Beside my village there flows a river called Dhalesshori river. 

I have some special friend who are always helpful. 
I lead my life so happy.
